title: Poolhall Junkies
summary: Obsessed by the world of pool, Johnny could be one of the best. But his mentor and "trainer" Joe , a shady hustler who decides how and who Johnny plays, is holding him back from his dream. When the day finally comes, Johnny breaks from Joe, which leads to only one thing -- violence. Joe is beaten up by some of Johnny's buddies as a sign to leave him alone, and with this final act of freedom, Johnny leaves the world of pool-sharking. After an ultimatum from his girlfriend Tara ('Alison Eastwood'), Johnny finally commits to a "real" job in the construction business, but is soon miserable there. He finds himself spending most of his time with his younger brother Danny who it seems is following in his footsteps on the road to a life Johnny left when he broke from Joe.
